tool_description: Identifies potential missing or unreported music usage by analyzing patterns, comparing platform coverage, and detecting gaps in usage reporting.

known_usage_data.description: Array of known usage records for comparison

analysis_time_window.description: Time window for gap analysis in days (1-365)

error_messages: Data volume exceeded: Maximum 100000 usage records for gap analysis.
Invalid time window: Analysis time window must be between 1-365 days.
Unknown detection algorithm: Use supported algorithms like pattern_analysis, coverage_gaps, statistical_modeling.
Invalid confidence threshold: Confidence threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
usage: Provide known_usage_data, platform_coverage_map, and analysis_time_window. Configure detection_algorithms and confidence_threshold to tune gap detection sensitivity.

potential_gaps.description: Array of identified potential usage gaps with details

estimated_missing_revenue.description: Estimated revenue from potentially missing usage

gap_analysis_report.description: Detailed analysis report of findings and recommendations
